flawed_nl_solution:
Tyler gives away 21 / 3 = <<21/3=7.0>>7.0 CDs
After giving away a third of his CDs, Tyler has 21 - 7.0 = <<21-7.0=41.0>>41.0 CDs
After buying new CDs, Tyler has 41.0 + 8 = <<41.0+8=49.0>>49.0 CDs

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14.0, not 41.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
